body.p:
Goethe is the result of a well⹀orders and polished, learned state, not physical, great, acknowledging culture and etiquette,—of moving mainly among gentlemen and ladies of culture, and taking it for granted that there is nothing bettermore neededbetterbetter than gentlemen and ladies of culture.—The
